prompt: Create an About Us page with a soft pastel pink background and a centered logo at the top using a heart-shaped icon with a white accent. Display the company name 'InnovateTech' in bold, dark pink text. Include a company description in a centered paragraph with dark gray text. Feature an 'Our Team' section with three team member cards in a horizontal row, each with a heart-shaped avatar, name, and job title. Add a contact section at the bottom in a white container with a pink border. Use a Column layout with 16px padding and spacing, and a pink-white color scheme.
